info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:01AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, eastern Polk, southwestern Cleveland, northeastern Spartanburg and northwestern Cherokee Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 201 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Columbus to 10 miles southwest of Rutherfordton to 16 miles southwest of Forest City to 10 miles west of Spartanburg. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Forest City, Rutherfordton, Boiling Springs SC, Spindale, Boiling Springs NC, Cowpens, Mayo, Chesnee and Ellenboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
